title: About
text: I am particularly interested in epidemiological modeling, clinical data sciences, and using data visualization to communicate complex health information. My goal is to leverage data to contribute to meaningful public health outcomes.

title: Louise Oh
text:
I am a young biostatistician in training. I am pursuing my ScM in Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins School of Public Health. I completed my Bachelor’s degree at Northwestern University with a major in Statistics in minors in Data Science and Global Health Studies.
I was born in New Jersey and raised in the Philippines and South Korea. I spend my free time Olympic weightlifting and CrossFit. I also love traveling, thrifting, and exploring cafes and bakeries in town.
